title: What? No jail time for Sandra Bullock’s stalker!
itunes:title: What? No jail time for Sandra Bullock’s stalker!
description:
The stalker who broke into Sandra Bullock’s home, forcing the frightened actress to hide in a closet, was sentenced to 5 years probation after pleading no contest in a Los Angeles court. Joshua James Corbett, 41, must also undergo mental evaluation. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke discuss the case in this episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
